item.title: Hegseth team told to stop polygraph tests after complaint to White House
item.description: The polygraph tests of Pentagon officials occurred as the defense secretary sought to stamp out unflattering leaks to the media.

item.title: Trump calls leaders of Thailand and Cambodia to push for a ceasefire
item.description: The president suggests that the U.S. is ready to impose heavy tariffs on both countries if border clashes continue.

item.title: Trump’s MAGA allies zero in on Ghislaine Maxwell as Epstein furor persists
item.description: The intensifying focus on Ghislaine Maxwell represents the latest turn in a winding case that has long been a focus of conspiracy theorists.
